Text: This release is 4:3 letterbox widescreen, not 16:9 anamorphic widescreen. Also the quality seems pretty poor, but that is not necessarily the posters fault. Thanks anyway!

I highly recommend this superb thriller to all cineasts who missed it. It would be great tho if it would pop up in lbx =)

/Nina
excellent!!! thank you very munch man!!! keep on.
